00022 /* the main program */
00023 void mexFunction(int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[], int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[])
00024 {
00025   MexParams Params(0,1,nlhs,plhs,1,1,nrhs,prhs);
00026   const Image img(Params.getInput(0));
00027   Image result = lowPass6yDecY(lowPass6xDecX(img));
00028   Params.setOutput(0,result.getArray());
00029 }
